# Copilot Instructions

## GitHub CLI Output
- `gh` commands that display logs or detailed output use alternate buffers
- Always redirect output to files in `.tmp/` directory for analysis
- Example: `gh run view <id> --log > .tmp/run.log 2>&1`

## Workflow Files
- Use hard-coded version tags in `uses` fields (no variables allowed)
- Keep workflows consistent across the repository
